projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.shortDescription: A comprehensive workout tracking application for fitness enthusiasts.
projects.description: This workout tracking application allows users to create custom workout plans, track their progress, and visualize their fitness journey. It features a responsive design, user authentication, and data persistence using local storage.
learningOutcomes: Implemented responsive design principles for all device sizes
Created a multi-page application with coherent navigation
Developed data persistence using local storage
Implemented form validation for user input

projects.title: Recipe Finder
projects.shortDescription: An application for discovering and saving recipes.
projects.description: The Recipe Finder app allows users to search for recipes, view detailed instructions, and save their favorites. The application demonstrates advanced JavaScript concepts including data fetching, filtering, and dynamic content generation.
learningOutcomes: Designed a clean, intuitive user interface
Used JSON for data storage and retrieval

projects.title: Personal Blog Platform
projects.shortDescription: A customizable blog platform with content management features.
projects.description: This blog platform allows users to create, edit, and publish articles with a simple and intuitive interface. Features include category tagging, search functionality, and responsive design for all device sizes.
learningOutcomes: Created responsive layouts using CSS Grid and Flexbox

projects.title: Cool Pics Photo Gallery
projects.shortDescription: An interactive photo gallery with filtering and lightbox features.
projects.description: The Cool Pics Photo Gallery allows users to browse, filter, and view high-resolution images in a responsive and interactive interface. Features include category filtering, lightbox view, and image metadata display.

projects.title: User Registration System
projects.shortDescription: A comprehensive user registration form with validation.
projects.description: This project features a multi-step registration form with client-side validation, progress tracking, and confirmation feedback. It demonstrates form handling, input validation, and user experience optimization.

projects.title: Data Sorting Visualization
projects.shortDescription: A visual demonstration of different sorting algorithms.
projects.description: This project visualizes various sorting algorithms in action, allowing users to compare performance and understand how different algorithms work. Features include speed control, step-by-step execution, and algorithm comparison.
learningOutcomes: Created visual representations of data processes
Designed interactive controls for algorithm parameters

projects.title: Credit Card Validator
projects.shortDescription: A tool for validating and formatting credit card information.
projects.description: This credit card validation tool allows users to verify card numbers, format expiration dates, and validate security codes. It implements the Luhn algorithm for card number validation and provides real-time feedback.
learningOutcomes: Implemented the Luhn algorithm for card validation

projects.title: Mission Statement Page
projects.shortDescription: An animated landing page showcasing a company mission statement.
projects.description: This project showcases a company's mission statement with animated elements, parallax scrolling, and interactive components. The design focuses on storytelling and user engagement.
